com.communote.server.core.tag

Interface TagManagement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TagManagementBase, TagManagementImpl

    public interface TagManagement
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • assignGlobalIdForTag

        void assignGlobalIdForTag(Tag tag)
        Assigns the globalId to a tag if there is not yet a suitable globalId a new one will be created. If the tag already has a globalId nothing will change.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag.

      • createTag

        @Deprecated
Tag createTag(String name)
                   throws TagNotFoundException,
                          TagStoreNotFoundException
        Deprecated. Use createTag(Tag tag) instead.
        Create the given tag using a new transaction, the new transacion will only be create when using this method via ServiceLocator.getTagMangement()
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tag.
        Returns:
        The created tag.
        Throws:
        TagNotFoundException - TagNotFoundException.
        TagStoreNotFoundException - Exception.

      • createTagInDatabaseNewTx

        Tag createTagInDatabaseNewTx(TagTO tag,
                             TagStore tagStore)
        Creates a tag in the database. Instead of calling this method directly, always use storeTag! The operation is run in a new transaction. Throws DataIntegrityViolationException if the tag already exists
        Parameters:
        tag - The TO describing the tag to create filled with all details.
        tagStore - The tag store.
        Returns:
        The tag created within the database.

      • findOrCreateTag

        @Deprecated
Tag findOrCreateTag(String name)
        Deprecated. Use findOrCreateTag(Tag tag) instead.
        Tries to find the tag with the given name. If it does not exists it will be created using the create method using a new transaction. If this one fails, due to a already exists constraint, it will be tried to recover.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tag.
        Returns:
        The found or created tag.

      • findTag

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
Tag findTag(Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the tag.
        Returns:
        The tag by it's id.

      • findTag

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
<T> T findTag(Long id,
                                            Converter<Tag,T> converter)
        Method to find a tag and convert it to a final type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Final type of the tag.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the tag.
        converter - The converter to use.
        Returns:
        Converted tag for the given id.

      • findTag

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
TagData findTag(Long id,
                                              Locale locale)
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the tag.
        locale - The locale to use.
        Returns:
        The localized tag as TagData or null if the tag does not exist.

      • findTag

        Tag findTag(String name,
            TagStoreType.Types type)
        Finds a tag
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tag.
        type - Type of the tag.
        Returns:
        The found tag or null.

      • findTagByTagStoreNewTx

        Tag findTagByTagStoreNewTx(String tagStoreTagId,
                           String tagStoreAlias)
        Retrieves a tag by its TagStore definition. The operation is run in a new transaction.
        Parameters:
        tagStoreTagId - the ID of the within the tag store
        tagStoreAlias - the alias of the tag store
        Returns:
        the found tag or null if not found

      • findTagByTagStoreNewTx

        <T> T findTagByTagStoreNewTx(String tagStoreTagId,
                             String tagStoreAlias,
                             Converter<Tag,T> converter)
        Retrieves a tag by its TagStore definition. The operation is run in a new transaction.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Final type of the tag.
        Parameters:
        tagStoreTagId - the ID of the within the tag store
        tagStoreAlias - the alias of the tag store
        converter - The converter to use.
        Returns:
        Converted tag for the given id.

      • findTagNewTx

        Tag findTagNewTx(String name)
        Find the given tag using a _new_ transaction, the new transacion will only be create then using this methode over the ServiceLocator.getTagMangement() This method should be only called internal from #findOrCreateTag!
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tag.
        Returns:
        The found tag or null.

      • getCount

        int getCount(Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the usage count of the given tag within the users access restrictions.

      • removeNoteTag

        void removeNoteTag(long oldTagId,
                   Long newTagId)
            throws AuthorizationException,
                   TagNotFoundException
        Remove a note tag. Optionally a new tag can be provided to add it to the notes as a replacement of the old tag. If the tag to remove does not exist nothing will happen. If there are followers of the oldTag these users will automatically follow the newTag if a new tag should be set.
        Parameters:
        oldTagId - the ID of the tag to remove
        newTagId - optional ID of tag to add the notes from which the other tag is removed
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user or a client manager
        TagNotFoundException - in case newTagId is referring to non-existing tag

      • renameTag

        void renameTag(long tagId,
               String newName)
        throws AuthorizationException,
               TagNotFoundException,
               IllegalArgumentException,
               TagAlreadyExistsException
        Rename an existing internal note tag.
        Parameters:
        tagId - Id of the tag.
        newName - The new default name.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user or a client manager
        TagNotFoundException - in case the tag to rename does not exist
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the tag to rename is not an internal tag
        TagAlreadyExistsException - in case the there is already an existing internal note tag with the new name

      • storeTag

        Tag storeTag(TagTO tag)
      throws TagNotFoundException,
             TagStoreNotFoundException
        Creates a new tag based on the given parameters or updates an existing tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag to create.
        Returns:
        The created tag.
        Throws:
        TagNotFoundException - TagNotFoundException.
        TagStoreNotFoundException - TagStoreNotFoundException.
